trans-unit.source: Propagates the current behavior in the expression to child nodes.
This class cannot be inherited.
This class is used by all <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.IRuleExpression> methods to propagate behavior to child nodes.
Identifies the fields and properties used by an expression and adds these as symbols to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAnalysis"></xref> instance.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAnalysis"></xref> instance that stores symbols representing the properties and fields used by rule conditions and actions.
The expression being executed.

`true` if fields and properties read by a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> are to be added to <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAnalysis"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.

`true` if fields and properties written by a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> are to be added to <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAnalysis"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
The path of a field or property determined up to this point.
analysis is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
Creates a deep copy of the child nodes of the current <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref>.
The expression that the clone is based on.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> that is identical to this instance.
Decompiles the child nodes of the expression into string form.
The <xref href="System.Text.StringBuilder"></xref> that contains the mutable string of characters.
The current <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref>.
The parent <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref>.
Evaluates the expression and all child expressions.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"></xref> to execute the expression.
The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> to evaluate.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionResult"></xref> that indicates the result of the expression evaluation.
execution is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
Compares the current expression and child nodes to another expression to determine whether they are equal.
The first <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> in the comparison.
The second <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> in the comparison.
`true` if the expressions are equal; otherwise, `false`.
Verifies that the expression and child nodes are configured correctly and has no errors.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> to manage the validation process.
The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> to evaluate.

`true` if fields and properties written by a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> are stored in by <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAnalysis"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionInfo"></xref> for the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref>.
validation is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
The expression is null and the errors collection on the object is a null reference (`Nothing`).
